tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles ( 
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    candidate_name VARCHAR(50), 
    candidate_party VARCHAR(50), 
    candidate_age INT, 
    eligibility_criteria VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE CandidateProfiles (
  candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  education VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE EligibilityCriteria (
  criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  minimum_age INT,
  maximum_age INT,
  minimum_experience_years INT,
  required_education VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    education VARCHAR(100),
    experience VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE eligibility_criteria (
    criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    criteria_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    minimum_age INT,
    maximum_age INT,
    min_education_requirement VARCHAR(100),
    min_experience_requirement VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE candidate_votes (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    voter_id INT,
    vote_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidate_profiles(candidate_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id)
)

CREATE TABLE voter_profiles (
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CandidateProfiles (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 party_affiliation VARCHAR(100),
 age INT,
 experience_years INT
);

CREATE TABLE EligibilityCriteria (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 minimum_age INT,
 citizenship_requirement VARCHAR(100),
 education_level VARCHAR(100),
 criminal_record_check BOOLEAN
);
